original_text: Then we said ‘goodbye’ to each other and the believers returned to their homes in the city. We went and we got on the ship again, together with Paul.
korean_text: 서로 작별한 후 우리는 배에 오르고 그들은 집으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: Then we said 'goodbye' to each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 서로 작별 인사를 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the believers returned to their homes
and we got on the ship again
